origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CommodityMarketAPI.analyze_demand_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of a specified economic indicator on the demand for commodities.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'economic_indicator', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The economic indicator to analyze, e.g., global_gdp_growth, inflation_rate.'}, {'name': 'commodity', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The commodity to analyze. Use 'all' to analyze the impact on all commodities.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'A report detailing the impact of the economic indicator on commodity demand.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CommodityMarketAPI.analyze_demand_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'economic_indicator'是'global_gdp_growth', 'commodity'是'all'.

prediction:
想法：分析全球经济增长对所有商品需求的影响。

动作：CommodityMarketAPI.analyze_demand_impact

动作参数：'economic_indicator': 'global_gdp_growth', 'commodity': 'all'
